import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Link, BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch, withRouter } from 'react-router-dom' import './paginate.css' import { Fragment } from 'react'; import Collapsible from 'react-collapsible'; class StatiquePage extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { clicSession: true, clicScolarite: false, clicReglement: false, listpermissions: [], permissionGestionRoles: [], permissionGestionUtilisateurs: [], permissionTypeEnseign: [], permissionNivBase: [], permissionFilieres: [], permissionMatieres: [], permissionSpecialites: [], permissionNiveaux: [], permissionMatFor: [], permissionEnseignants: [], permissionModalPay: [], permissionGroupes: [], permissionApprenants: [], permissionFraisFormation: [], permissionTypePayEleve: [], permissionFormations: [] } } componentDidMount() { var userPermissions = JSON.parse((localStorage.getItem('userPermissions'))); if (userPermissions != null) { this.setState({ listpermissions: userPermissions }) var gestionRoles = userPermissions[0] this.setState({ permissionGestionRoles: gestionRoles }) var gestionUtilisateurs = userPermissions[1] this.setState({ permissionGestionUtilisateurs: gestionUtilisateurs }) var typeEnseign = userPermissions[2] this.setState({ permissionTypeEnseign: typeEnseign }) var nivBase = userPermissions[3] this.setState({ permissionNivBase: nivBase }) var filieres = userPermissions[4] this.setState({ permissionFilieres: filieres }) var matieres = userPermissions[5] this.setState({ permissionMatieres: matieres }) var specialites = userPermissions[6] this.setState({ permissionSpecialites: specialites }) var niveaux = userPermissions[7] this.setState({ permissionNiveaux: niveaux }) var matFor = userPermissions[8] this.setState({ permissionMatFor: matFor }) var enseignants = userPermissions[9] this.setState({ permissionEnseignants: enseignants }) var modalPay = userPermissions[10] this.setState({ permissionModalPay: modalPay }) var groupes = userPermissions[12] this.setState({ permissionGroupes: groupes }) var apprenants = userPermissions[14] this.setState({ permissionApprenants: apprenants }) var fraisFormation = userPermissions[15] this.setState({ permissionFraisFormation: fraisFormation }) var papiers = userPermissions[16] this.setState({ permissionPapiers: papiers }) var typePayEleve = userPermissions[17] this.setState({ permissionTypePayEleve: typePayEleve }) var formations = userPermissions[19] this.setState({ permissionFormations: formations }) if (userPermissions[0].idRoleUser != 1) { this.setState({ clicScolarite: true }); } } else { this.props.history.push('/'); } } clicSession = () => { this.setState({ clicSession: true, clicScolarite: false, clicReglement: false }); this.props.history.push('/Users'); } clicScolarite = () => { this.setState({ clicScolarite: true, clicSession: false, clicReglement: false }); this.props.history.push('/TypeEnseign'); } clicReglement = () => { this.setState({ clicReglement: true, clicScolarite: false, clicSession: false }); this.props.history.push('/ReglApprenant'); } clearStorage = () => { localStorage.clear(); this.props.history.push('/'); } render() { return (
